attributes.action: Do the only DECENT thing and Resign
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This latest financial scandal is enough. It is outrageous that the PM has ordered 'an inquiry' into what is clearly a money-making scheme. No other employee would be able to defend himself against such a blatant abuse of position. I have had enough of immigration lies, justice lies, political lies, personal lies, gun & knife murders, the soaring crime rates + lenient Sentences  -- the list seems to be endless! If this government had an iota of decency, they would call a General Election at the very earliest possible opportunity. However, such abhorrent, self-seeking individuals will, I suppose, battle on dishonestly to the bitter end.  What hope for the future of this country?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
